output_list.reason: The 'createChamp' function does not have a proper overflow check when updating the 'readyTime' of a new champ, allowing users to set this value to a very large number, which can be exploited to make the game unusable.

The 'setCreateChampFee' function does not have a proper overflow check when updating the 'createChampFee' variable, allowing users to set this value to a very large number, which can be exploited to make the game unusable.

The 'withdrawChamp' function does not have a proper overflow check when updating the 'withdrawCooldown' of a champ, allowing users to set this value to a very large number, which can be exploited to make the game unusable.
The 'randMod' function uses 'blockhash' which is deprecated and unsafe, allowing attackers to manipulate the output of this function, leading to unpredictable randomness.

The 'forgeItems' function does not have a proper overflow check when updating the 'readyTime' of a champ, allowing users to set this value to a very large number, which can be exploited to make the game unusable.
